parameters: Evil
Welcome to Lugnica Academy, you warts! I'm
your principal, Mr.Ricardo. No one gets
through this academy unless they are the
best of the best.
Evil
As you know, you are split up into classes
based on your skill level. Class 1 being
the lowest, and Class 4 being the highest.
There will be 2 tournaments this year.
Evil
These tournaments will determine your
final position. If you manage to reach
enough points to be classified as Class 4
by the end of the year, you graduate!
Evil
Simple enough right? If you current Class 4
members can hold your positions, then it'll
be quite easy. Most of you should graduate
by the end of the year.
Evil
Everyone else, aim to have enough points
to be ranked in Class 4...if you can...heh.
Jay
He's totally looking down on us...I'm
telling you Richard, this guy doesn't seem
nice at all!
Richard
No surprise there, people are awful
creatures.
Richard
This place is really strange, nothing about
this place placates me. However, I must
get enough points to reach Class 4.
*A strange laugh could be heard from an unobservable
area*
Rob
Hahahahahaha! You'll never catch me now!
People3
Help! A fox stole things from my room.
Evil
Well...I'm sorry about that...disturbance.
Anyways, please make your way to the
classrooms. You should have received a
letter stating which room you were assigned
Evil
Good luck everyone, and welcome to
Lugnica Academy!
A
*Everyone went to their classrooms* Your classroom
is 1-2, the second-lowest tier.
Actor1
What do you want? Can't you see I'm trying
to pay attention to the teacher. Get out!
Actor1
Can you kindly get OUT of my way?
Actor1
Y'all look weak. Name's Pafe. I'm better
than you so go away!
Actor1
I hate my brother Karl. He never gets in
the house!
Actor1
I'd like some of mom's spaghetti right now.
Actor2
Hello. Please listen to the principal. It
is important.
Actor3
Hi...
Actor1
Hmph...
Roland
This speech reeks. I'm tired. Shantanu
let's just go home...
Lugnica Academy- Main Campus
Actor3
Who are you? Sorry, I don't talk to boys.
Shantanu
Now, now Roland...let us remember our goal.
Actor3
I'm gonna do so well this year!
Actor3
All of these people....weak...I sense no
strength in this class. Hopefully, some of
the veterans have something better to
offer.
